attributes.action: FREE PARKING for Beckside Area residents Beverley and surrounding areas affected
attributes.additional_details:
This is evidence of Parking Permits in other areas, which are significantly lower

Town - One permit per household  
Anlaby -  £10 per year  
Brough - £15 per year  
Brough - visitor permit £15 per year  
Hessle - £10 per year  
Willerby - £10 per year   

http://www.eastriding.gov.uk/environment/roads-streets-traffic-and-parking/parking/restricted-parking-areas-cpz-and-rps/resident-parking-schemes-rps/buy-renew-a-rps-permit/
attributes.background:
Since the Flemingate development was built, resident parking charges have been brought in, making us pay for parking outside our OWN HOMES. 

It costs £30/year for first car & the EXORBITANT price of £105 for second car!

We urge people from Beverley to get together and support this cause

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also submit a petition to the council: 

http://www2.eastriding.gov.uk/council/committees/petitions/
